Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Statuette of Harpocrates
Description: Upper section of a statue of Harpocrates holding in his left hand a cornucopia. The right arm is folded, a finger brought to the lips. The "side-lock of youth" is located on the right side of the head. Curls of the hair are indicated on the forehead.
